articles.title: "Super Powerful Bombs" Hit Ukraine's Port City Amid New Rescue Attempt - NDTV
articles.description: Two "super powerful bombs" rocked Mariupol on Tuesday as Ukrainian authorities made a fresh attempt at rescuing civilians from the besieged port city which has suffered relentless shelling since Russia's invasion began almost a month ago.
articles.content:
Two "powerful bombs" slammed into the city even as rescue efforts were ongoing (FILE)

articles.title: NASA confirms existence of over 5,000 exoplanets - DTNEXT
articles.description: The planetary odometer turned on March 21, with the latest batch of 65 exoplanets - planets outside our immediate solar family - added to the NASA Exoplanet Archive.
